title: Pest risk analysis: Why we do it and why it is important

subtasks: Research biological and scientific evidence related to the organism
Assess the likelihood of the pest's introduction
Evaluate the potential for the pest's establishment and spread
Determine the economic damage caused by the pest
Develop strategies to mitigate unacceptable impacts
Inform national or sub-national programs such as surveillance and eradication
Support import requirements and policies for regulated pests
Utilize international standards for phytosanitary measures

tasks.task: Utilize International Phytosanitary Portal and FAO e-learning resources
subtasks: Access free e-learning courses at elearning.fao.org
